adjectives.description: recurvate (comparative more recurvate, superlative most recurvate)

verbs.description: recurvate (third-person singular simple present recurvates, present participle recurvating, simple past and past participle recurvated)

entries.meaning: To bend or curve back; to recurve.
examples: With a bill two inches and a half long , very ſlender , and a little recurvated : head , and upper part of neck , cinereous , with dusky lines : over each eye a white line
